trans-unit.source: Azure and Service Bus Programming Lifecycle
trans-unit.target: Azure and Service Bus Programming Lifecycle

trans-unit.source: Azure and Service Bus Programming Lifecycle
trans-unit.target: Azure and Service Bus Programming Lifecycle

trans-unit.source: <token>sb2</token> enables web service applications to expose their functionality to clients through firewalls and on different application platforms.
trans-unit.target: <token>sb2</token> enables web service applications to expose their functionality to clients through firewalls and on different application platforms.

trans-unit.source: This topic outlines the tasks that you can use to host a web service on <token>azure_1</token> and expose its functionality using <token>sb2</token> to connect your application with those of your customers.
trans-unit.target: This topic outlines the tasks that you can use to host a web service on <token>azure_1</token> and expose its functionality using <token>sb2</token> to connect your application with those of your customers.

trans-unit.source: Tasks required for creating an Azure application for Service Bus
trans-unit.target: Tasks required for creating an Azure application for Service Bus

trans-unit.source: The basic tasks required to create an <token>azure_1</token> application that accesses <token>sb2</token> are the same as those in the topics described in <link xlink:href="dd906d0f-bdb5-4086-acfe-805a1ad35a66" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Basic AppFabric Service Bus Programming Lifecycle</link>, with the exception that you must perform some tasks required to host your application in <token>azure_1</token>.
trans-unit.target: The basic tasks required to create an <token>azure_1</token> application that accesses <token>sb2</token> are the same as those in the topics described in <link xlink:href="dd906d0f-bdb5-4086-acfe-805a1ad35a66" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Basic AppFabric Service Bus Programming Lifecycle</link>, with the exception that you must perform some tasks required to host your application in <token>azure_1</token>.

trans-unit.source: This is true whether your .NET application uses <token>indigo2</token> and SOAP, the <externalLink><linkText>WCF REST Programming Model</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=185078</linkUri></externalLink>, or .NET HTTP request programming directly.
trans-unit.target: This is true whether your .NET application uses <token>indigo2</token> and SOAP, the <externalLink><linkText>WCF REST Programming Model</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=185078</linkUri></externalLink>, or .NET HTTP request programming directly.

trans-unit.source: To restate the complete lifecycle:
trans-unit.target: To restate the complete lifecycle:

trans-unit.source: Create the <token>sb2</token> project and <token>servicensd</token>.
trans-unit.target: Create the <token>sb2</token> project and <token>servicensd</token>.

trans-unit.source: The project and namespace contain the resources to support your application.
trans-unit.target: The project and namespace contain the resources to support your application.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="95fd7efd-7a4b-49c8-8eea-297d24c9ee08" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Managing Service Bus Service Namespaces</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="95fd7efd-7a4b-49c8-8eea-297d24c9ee08" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Managing Service Bus Service Namespaces</link>.

trans-unit.source: Define the service contract that is to be registered with <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: Define the service contract that is to be registered with <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: A contract specifies the signature of the service and the data it exchanges.
trans-unit.target: A contract specifies the signature of the service and the data it exchanges.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="dfaace1b-c418-4e06-83cf-0261144ebd7a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Designing an AppFabric Service Bus Contract</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="dfaace1b-c418-4e06-83cf-0261144ebd7a" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Designing an AppFabric Service Bus Contract</link>.

trans-unit.source: There are no additional steps at this point: <token>azure_1</token> can act as the platform for a <token>indigo1</token> interface for both a service and client application that has no modifications to the interface.
trans-unit.target: There are no additional steps at this point: <token>azure_1</token> can act as the platform for a <token>indigo1</token> interface for both a service and client application that has no modifications to the interface.

trans-unit.source: Implement the service contract.
trans-unit.target: Implement the service contract.

trans-unit.source: To implement a contract, create the class whose methods define the operations.
trans-unit.target: To implement a contract, create the class whose methods define the operations.

trans-unit.source: As with the previous step, there is nothing specific for <token>azure_1</token> to do at this point: <token>azure_1</token> is the host for a web service that has no additional modifications to the interface implementation.
trans-unit.target: As with the previous step, there is nothing specific for <token>azure_1</token> to do at this point: <token>azure_1</token> is the host for a web service that has no additional modifications to the interface implementation.

trans-unit.source: Configure the service by specifying endpoint information and other behavior information.
trans-unit.target: Configure the service by specifying endpoint information and other behavior information.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="c3c38827-e436-4e31-8ea6-3d90e6d169d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring an AppFabric Service Bus Application</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="c3c38827-e436-4e31-8ea6-3d90e6d169d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Configuring an AppFabric Service Bus Application</link>.

trans-unit.source: In addition, you must configure the <token>azure_1</token> service or client to use full trust authentication.
trans-unit.target: In addition, you must configure the <token>azure_1</token> service or client to use full trust authentication.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="e06ca647-5b80-4c1e-af93-6dfb8f67bbe1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Configure an Azure Service or Client Application</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="e06ca647-5b80-4c1e-af93-6dfb8f67bbe1" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Configure an Azure Service or Client Application</link>.

trans-unit.source: Create and run the service.
trans-unit.target: Create and run the service.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="c0d7519c-c542-4f05-b038-23b78f3ca895" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Host an Azure service through the AppFabric Service Bus</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="c0d7519c-c542-4f05-b038-23b78f3ca895" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Host an Azure service through the AppFabric Service Bus</link>.

trans-unit.source: If your service is running locally (but connecting to an <token>azure_1</token>-hosted client), there are no additional steps to perform.
trans-unit.target: If your service is running locally (but connecting to an <token>azure_1</token>-hosted client), there are no additional steps to perform.

trans-unit.source: Create and build the client application.
trans-unit.target: Create and build the client application.

trans-unit.source: If the client application is running on the local computer, it requires no additional steps.
trans-unit.target: If the client application is running on the local computer, it requires no additional steps.

trans-unit.source: Depending upon the state of your application, you may not have to perform all these steps, or in this sequence.
trans-unit.target: Depending upon the state of your application, you may not have to perform all these steps, or in this sequence.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to build a client for a pre-existing service, start at step 5.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you want to build a client for a pre-existing service, start at step 5.

trans-unit.source: Or, if you are building a service that others will use, you can skip step 6.
trans-unit.target: Or, if you are building a service that others will use, you can skip step 6.
